main event: A witness observed a round white object the size of a baseball on 6 November 1957.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 30 seconds,The object was moving at speeds between 600-1000 mph,The object reached an altitude of 60,000 feet,The object was initially stationary before moving north-south,The sighting was reported to the Yonkers, N.Y. agency.
sighted object: round white object the size of a baseball
